set.xpath: /items/item[(contains(@name, 'plantFiber') or contains(@name, 'leatherBoots') or contains(@name, 'cowboyHat') or contains(@name, 'Cap') or contains(@name, 'miningHelmet') or contains(@name, 'footballHelmet') or contains(@name, 'shades') or contains(@name, 'goggles') or contains(@name, 'Goggles') or contains(@name, 'eyeglasses') or contains(@name, 'nerdGlasses') or contains(@name, 'bandana') or contains(@name, 'Pants') or contains(@name, 'tankTop') or contains(@name, 'worn') or contains(@name, 'runningShoes') or contains(@name, 'shirt') or contains(@name, 'pufferCoat') or contains(@name, 'jacketWhite'))]/property[@name='ActionSkillGroup' and (@value='Clothing/Armor')]/@value

/items/item[(contains(@name, 'scrap') or contains(@name, 'iron') or contains(@name, 'heavyBandit') or contains(@name, 'swatHelmet'))]/property[@name='ActionSkillGroup' and (@value='Clothing/Armor')]/@value

/items/item[(contains(@name, 'military') or contains(@name, 'hazmat') or contains(@name, 'leatherHood') or contains(@name, 'miningHelmet') or contains(@name, 'gasMask') or contains(@name, 'animalHide') or contains(@name, 'leatherDuster') or contains(@name, 'armyShirt'))]/property[@name='ActionSkillGroup' and (@value='Clothing/Armor')]/@value
